keys_z_x_dot_fslash_key2:
In this part of the Bottom Rows tutorial, we'll learn the use of `keys` `z` , `x` , `.` and `/`.
Position your left little finger and left ring finger on the left groove on the `key`board, and your right litlle finger and right ring finger on the right groove of the `key`board. The bottom row `keys` will be on level below the home row `keys`. With each of your rign and little fingers, try to reach the `keys` `z`, `x` and `/`, and try to remember the movement. Look away from the `key`board and feel the grooves with your fingers and try to find them by moving your fingers away.
